verbs.description: The veteran New York Giants captain [V: has] invited President Donald Trump to spend some time in the team 's locker room .
[ARG0: The veteran New York Giants captain] has [V: invited] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: to spend some time in the team 's locker room] .
